website_summaries.verdict: East of use, lots of jets, and  a roomy interior put this inflatable hot tub at the top of our list.
pros: Very user-friendly, as this model isn't overly difficult to set up, plus it has straightforward controls and is easy to deflate
Has 87 jets that create a relaxing flow of water while you soak
cons: Some hot tubs had faulty filters

customer_reviews.title: Great treat.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this just over a year and at first used it constantly over the summer months, although the novelty has worn off a little I still use it when I have a few days off from work. It takes a lot of electricity to keep warm in the winter so I pack it away when the winter arrives. It certainly could have a better filter, this is the only drawback I can think of.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. L. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, easy to empty and easy controls. Used it last summer and my daughter absolutely loved it. If you can spare the money for it and the future water bills then I recommend you get one. You will not regret.
customer_reviews.author: Mihai Udrea

customer_reviews.title: Lazy-spa lazy-spa where do I begin!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great product used it every day since putting up ,me an wife suffer from arthritis to varying degrees has helped no end ,only down side instructions a bit sparce but anyone with common sense can work them out, i.e how long to clhorinenate ,timer function instruction printed very tiny ,apart from that would recommend to everyone ,also arrived next day very promt.
customer_reviews.author: whitewitch

customer_reviews.title: Great gift bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: Great product, bought this for my mums 50th, she suffers from fibromyalgia and this helps... although it takes time to heat up it’s a great product, it’s not too noisy and the size is decent the installation was easy but I followed the videos online. the packaging could’ve been better
customer_reviews.author: Manisha

customer_reviews.title: Fiddly to pack away, dry it well & make sure it’s on a smooth surface when you deflate & fold up
customer_reviews.text: Ordered to replace previous one I had for four years. Was packed so well I just connected up to inflate & filled with water. Pump was better model. Still takes ages to heat up water. Quiet to run until you use multi jet bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: TinksKindle

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!

customer_reviews.title: My favourite purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: My favourite purchase ever ! Was a bit apprehensive if it would live up to the hype and would be just a one time use purchase that would then sit packed away in the shed! Couldn’t be more wrong. Was easy to set up ( do watch the short how to set it up video online). We set it up with 2 of us but could easily do on your own. We have used it daily since. I would advice buying the chemical kit and protector mat to go under it. A great purchase and really good quality product. I am really surprised and pleased. Seats 4 comfortable. Easy to maintain daily if got the chemical kit.
customer_reviews.author: Twisted Angel

customer_reviews.title: Love the updated version
customer_reviews.text: Having owned the vegas when it first come out then selling it due to the winter approaching I miss it like mad! I've now bought this one and this is the updated version. It just gets better! I like the test and reset buttons on the cord, much easier than trying to reset it with a screwdriver! I also love the fact that now you can pop the bubbles on without it turning the heat off. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Anna S. Warman

customer_reviews.title: Best £ I ever spent!
customer_reviews.text: Best....purchase....ever! Why has my world not had a hot tub in it sooner! It's easy to put up, easy to fill, ..easy to maintain, you get the idea. We bought a 3x3m waterproof gazebo to go round it and it's become and all weather tub now. I love it, everyone of my family loves it, and I can 100% guarantee...you will love it too! What you waiting for?....go buy one! :)

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Hot Tub without spending £1000's!
customer_reviews.text: Great Hot Tub at a great price, really easy to set up - we had this up and running within an hour. You do need to buy the chemicals to keep the water balance correct and a ready supply of test strips. We use the dispenser that comes with the Hot Tub with the Clearwater tablets and this keeps things really stable. The heating function is good - make sure you keep the cover on when not using or when heating up the water as this really helps keep the heat in. We have used it far more than we thought and the kids absolutely love it too! Recommended!

product_meta.title: Lay-z-spa Vegas Inflatable Portable Hot Tub Spa, 4-6 Person
product_meta.description: Comfortable and luxurious, the Vegas Hot Tub from Lay-Z-Spa is big enough for the whole family to unwind. With space for up to 6 people the Vegas has an external filter and heater that warms the the water up to a delightful 40?C. Accompanied with the AirJets(TM) Massage System this creates a truly divine outdoors experience.Relax in style with the Lay-Z-Spa Vegas Hot Tub. Set it up practically anywhere with a flat surface in under ten minutes, with no need for tools or professional assistance. The Vegas Hot Tub comes with an inflatable lid and also helps save energy with a built-in timer that switches the heater and pump off when not in use. The timer can be set to a to start heating at specified times too, so it will be ready and waiting for you after a long day at work. This beatuiful hot tub is a great addition to any garden and comes with a one-year warranty included.Features:A luxury portable inflatable hot tub for 4-6 peopleRapid heating system - Reaches temperatures of up to 40?CFits up to 6 people - Perfect for familiesAirJets Massage System - 87 air jets encircle the perimeter of the floorEnergy saving timer - Heats up tub at specified times so it's ready when you're ready10-minute setupInflatable lid included2 x filter cartridges included1 x chemical floater included - easily add the correct amount of water treatment (chemicals sold seperately)Includes setup and maintenance DVDInflated size - 196cm x 61cmWater capacity: 935L Cable length: 7m (approx)Power: 240v / 2KWWeight: 40kg1-year warranty
